meanings.definition: The dense, nonliving central wood of a tree, giving strength and support.
meanings.sent1: The heartwood of the tree provides stability and firmness.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully examined the heartwood of the oak tree for durability.
meanings.sent3: The heartwood decided to take a break from holding up the tree and went on strike.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the heartwood that kept her standing tall amidst challenges.
meanings.sent5: The heartwood, like a sturdy pillar, held the tree upright against the wind.
